game.assign_prizes_portrait: Drag and drop prize values next to your 5 favorite runners or use QUICK PICK then CONFIRM.
game.assign_prizes_landscape: Use the i's to view each horse’s info. Next, assign prize values to 5 horses - drag and drop prizes under their numbers or use QUICK PICK then CONFIRM.

portrait.help_text:
Use the information (i) icons to learn more about each runner.

Drag and drop prize values under 5 of the 8 numbers or use QUICK PICK to assign prize values to your 5 favorite runners, and then use CONFIRM to verify your picks for the race.

Use SPIN or AUTO SPIN to spin the reels and advance the runners down the raceway.

Arrows advance runners 1-3 spaces.

2x doubles a runner's current prize value.

The first runner that crosses the finish line wins! Let's hope 1 of your 5 runners makes it to the winner’s circle!

The first runner that crosses the finish line wins! Let's hope 1 of your 5 runners makes it to the winner’s circle!
